info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 12:18AM CST until January 12 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST FOR NORTHERN WOODRUFF...SOUTHEASTERN INDEPENDENCE...JACKSON... NORTHEASTERN WHITE AND SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 1218 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newport, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Newport... Augusta... Bald Knob... Judsonia... Tuckerman... Diaz... Newark... Swifton... Grubbs... Russell... Jacksonport... Tupelo... Algoa... McFadden... Bradford... Campbell Station... Sedgwick... Beedeville... Amagon... Weldon... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
